            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">
              <h2>How to Play Bingo Online</h2>
              <p>
                <b>Bingo is an incredibly simple game to play</b>
, and you can even use our automatic marking feature so you can enjoy the game without having to worry about missing a number. As the numbers are announced by the caller they will be marked off on your card or grid, and if you manage to                 <b>complete a set before the other players in the room you will be awarded a prize</b>
.              </p>
              <p>In the 90-ball versions, you’ll be rewarded when you finish one line, two lines or a full house, with the latter being the most valuable. 75-ball games are different to their counterpart, and in order to unlock prizes you are required to mark off a specific pattern on the card you receive at the beginning.</p>

            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">
              <h3>How do you win playing bingo online?</h3>
              <p>
In 75-ball games,                 <b>prizes can be won by completing patterns on the 5x5 card</b>
 you receive at the start, which results in the games often being longer. When you play our 90-ball titles, you win by                 <b>marking off numbers on your grid for one line, two lines or a full house</b>
.              </p>
            </section>
            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">
              <h3>How can I buy bingo tickets for your games?</h3>
              <p>
                <b>It’s very simple to purchase tickets for any of our online bingo games</b>
. Select the one you wish to play, and choose the ‘Buy Tickets’ option on your screen. You can then pick the amount of tickets you want to buy, and the transaction is completed when you confirm. There is also a ‘Quick Buy’ option if you want to do this more rapidly.              </p>
            </section>
            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">
              <h3>What happens if I fail to claim my bingo tickets?</h3>
              <p>
Your tickets will expire if they aren’t claimed in the time provided. When you buy your tickets you aren’t required to watch your games being played out, and                 <b>your numbers will be automatically marked to ensure you are still credited with any wins</b>
.              </p>

            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">

! Make the most of our live chat and you may be offered the chance to win free games by the hosts, where you could even win one of our progressive jackpots. Furthermore, you’ll be awarded                 <b>£50 in free bingo tickets when you sign up on-site, as soon as you’ve deposited and played with £10</b>
.              </p>
              <p>
Free tickets can also be won if you complete lines or a full house in some of our qualifying games.                 <b>Up to 72 tickets can be won in our special Play Off Palace Daily and Play Off Palace Weekly</b>
 titles.              </p>
            </section>
            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">

Our online bingo games can be played with your friends, and you can even earn yourself a bonus too! If you                 <a shape="rect" href="https://www.virgingames.com/terms#refer">Refer a Friend</a>
 to register with Virgin Games, you’ll receive a                 <b>£20 cash bonus once they’ve deposited at least £10, and then wagered a minimum of £40 with us</b>
. Your cash bonus can be used anywhere on our site, giving you even more free bingo!              </p>
            </section>
            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">

Join our growing community by using our live chat service, which allows you to get to know the other regular players! Contact our brilliant chat hosts if you ever have any questions about any of our games, and                 <b>these hosts also offer bonus games on occasion, meaning you could potentially win cash prizes and other rewards</b>
.              </p>
            </section>
            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">
              <h3>What happens if my internet goes down during a game?</h3>
              <p>In the unfortunate event of you losing connection while a game is being played, your tickets will be marked off automatically. Any winnings that you achieve during these automatic games are credited directly to your account.</p>
            </section>
            <section class="StyledContent-sc-rrhwky-0 flIPPD">
              <h3>What is the best online bingo site?</h3>

Enjoy some of the best bingo games when you play with us!                 <b>Tickets can be bought from just 1p</b>
, so you can take a seat in our online bingo halls no matter what your budget is! Every single title we have on-site gives you an opportunity to                 <b>trigger jackpots that are potentially worth thousands of pounds</b>
, with other excellent bonus features available too.              </p>
            </section>

document &&
  document.addEventListener("click", async (e) => {
    const trackedNodes = e.target.getAttribute('data-tracking')
    const isTracked = trackedNodes?.length > 1
    if (isTracked) {
      const trackingData = JSON.parse(trackedNodes);
      Array.isArray(trackingData)
        ? trackingData.map((data) => {
            registerTrackingEvent(data.label, data.name, data.mvtVariant, data.mvtCampaign, data.section);
          })
        : registerTrackingEvent(trackingData.label, trackingData.name, trackingData.mvtVariant, trackingData.mvtCampaign, trackingData.section);
    }
    const recommendationIdAttribute = e.target.getAttribute("mvt-tracking");
    let recommendationId
    try {
      const parsedRecommendationIdAttribute = JSON.parse(recommendationIdAttribute)
      recommendationId = parsedRecommendationIdAttribute.recommendationId && parsedRecommendationIdAttribute.recommendationId !== 'undefined' ? parsedRecommendationIdAttribute.recommendationId: null
    } catch {
      recommendationId = null
    }
    if (recommendationId){
      const query = 'query {successfulLandingCampaign(recommendationId: "' + recommendationId + '"){published}}'
      try {
        const res = await fetch(
          "https://www.virgingames.com/uk/graphql",
          {
            method: "POST",
            headers: {
              "Content-Type": "application/json",
              Accept: "application/json"
            },
            body: JSON.stringify({ query }),
          }
        );
        await res.json();
      } catch (error) {
        console.log(error);
      }
    }
  });

const registerTrackingEvent = (label, name, mvtVariant, mvtCampaign, section) => {
    return (
      utag.link({
      category: 'Web - Albatross',
      action: 'Click',
      label: label,
      name: name && name,
      section,
      mvtVariant,
      mvtCampaign
    })
    )
  }
